alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 12:24AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ROOSEVELT AND SOUTHEASTERN CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM MDT... At 1223 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grady to 6 miles northwest of Saint Vrain. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Texico, Cannon Air Force Base, Ranchvale, Portair, and Pleasant Hill. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 375 and 397. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Heavy rains will cause water to pond on roads and in low spots. Fast running water will quickly fill arroyos and ditches.
